feature.label: TeX Dojo
feature.description:
TeXDojo is a LaTeX/BibTeX editor for viewing and maintaining LaTeX files.
Current Version is 0.0.1
The GitHub page for the plug-in is https://github.com/harperjiang/BibEditor. Please report any issues or requests you have there.
